name: part_013
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】白上フブキ生誕祭2024　#FBKINGDOMPROLOGUE【ホロライブ⧸白上フブキ 】 [-a68MSMFuuM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_013.mov

scenes.description: Narration of the epilogue in a picture book style, summarizing the story of the fox child.
Credit roll for the 3D LIVE performance.
Fubuki closing the picture book on stage after the story ends.
Special messages to fans (Sukon-bu) and the announcement of Shirakami Fubuki's 1st Album "Blessing".

subtitles.original: "ひとり"じゃない　君もほら　僕ら手取り合って
subtitles.english: Not "alone". You see, let's take each other's hands.

subtitles.original: 笑おう！叫ぼう！あの宇宙の向こうへ
subtitles.english: Let's laugh! Let's shout! Towards the other side of that universe.

subtitles.original: Oh Yeah!! 無数の星の中
subtitles.english: Oh Yeah!! Amidst the countless stars,

subtitles.original: Oh Yeah!! 交わした約束も
subtitles.english: Oh Yeah!! even the promises we made,

subtitles.original: きっと　叶えられるさ
subtitles.english: will surely come true.

subtitles.original: Oh Yeah!! SUPERNOVA　翔ける今！
subtitles.english: Oh Yeah!! SUPERNOVA, soaring now!

subtitles.original: Oh Yeah!! 誰一人欠かせない
subtitles.english: Oh Yeah!! Not a single person can be missed.

subtitles.original: あの日描いた夢の先まで
subtitles.english: To the end of the dream we drew that day.

subtitles.original: Hi Friends!
subtitles.english: Hi Friends!

subtitles.original: こんな現在を愛せるように
subtitles.english: So that I can love the present like this.

subtitles.original: 君に向けて歌おう　心が叫んでる！
subtitles.english: Let's sing for you. My heart is shouting!

subtitles.original: Oh Yeah!! 無数の星の中
subtitles.english: Oh Yeah!! Amidst the countless stars,

subtitles.original: Oh Yeah!! 光は君がくれた
subtitles.english: Oh Yeah!! you gave me the light.

subtitles.original: もっと　越えていけるさ
subtitles.english: We can surely go even further.

subtitles.original: Oh Yeah!! SUPERNOVA　起こせ今！
subtitles.english: Oh Yeah!! SUPERNOVA, let's make it happen now!

subtitles.original: Oh Yeah!! 何度だって飛べる
subtitles.english: Oh Yeah!! We can fly as many times as it takes.

subtitles.original: これは紛れもなく僕らの軌跡
subtitles.english: This is undoubtedly our miracle.

subtitles.original: 普通も当たり前も無い　君が君らしく在れるように
subtitles.english: Neither normal nor ordinary exists. So that you can be yourself.

subtitles.original: もっとずっと　届けよう
subtitles.english: Let's keep delivering more and more.

subtitles.original: 不思議と怖くはないんだ　綺麗事、絵空事でもない
subtitles.english: Strangely, I'm not afraid. It's neither a platitude nor a fabrication.

subtitles.original: さあ、行こう！　この物語は終わらない！
subtitles.english: Come on, let's go! This story will never end!

subtitles.original: 白いキツネの子は手を掲げ歌い、その歌声が広場に響き渡ると、
subtitles.english: The white fox child raised her hand and sang, and as her singing voice echoed throughout the plaza,

subtitles.original: 人々の心は希望に満ち溢れ、1人、また1人と歌声が響き渡り
subtitles.english: people's hearts were filled with hope, and one by one, the singing voices resonated,

subtitles.original: 街は光に包まれました。そしてついに…
subtitles.english: and the town was enveloped in light. And finally...

subtitles.original: 白いキツネの子の夢は現実となり　平和な王国ははるか未来まで続いていくのでした。
subtitles.english: the white fox child's dream became a reality, and the peaceful kingdom continued far into the future.

subtitles.original: めでたし、めでたし。
subtitles.english: And they lived happily ever after.

subtitles.original: すこん部へ
subtitles.english: To Sukon-bu

subtitles.original: 君が居てくれるおかげで
subtitles.english: Thanks to you being there,

subtitles.original: これまで頑張ってこれたよ
subtitles.english: I've been able to work hard until now.

subtitles.original: そんな君と、これから先も
subtitles.english: With you, from now on too,

subtitles.original: フブキングダム　この場所を守っていきたい
subtitles.english: FBKINGDOM, I want to protect this place.

subtitles.original: 心からのありがとう
subtitles.english: A heartfelt thank you.

subtitles.original: そして
subtitles.english: And,

subtitles.original: １００万回の愛してるを届けます
subtitles.english: I send you a million 'I love you's.

subtitles.original: 白上フブキ 1st Album 発売決定
subtitles.english: Shirakami Fubuki 1st Album release confirmed.

subtitles.original: FBKINGDOM "Blessing"
subtitles.english: FBKINGDOM "Blessing"

subtitles.original: フブキングダムとみんなに祝福を込めて...
subtitles.english: With blessings to FBKINGDOM and everyone...
